title: Boosting NumPy with Numexpr and Cython
summary:
In this video from the 2012 PyData Workshop Francesc Alted from
Continuum Analytics is going to show you how you can boost NumPy with
Numexpr and Cython.
description:
Topics covered include:

-  The era of Big Data
-  NumPy and its ecosystem
-  Numexpr
-  Cython
